name: Light Fantasy Solo
description:
Light Fantasy Solo Solo Roleplaying for BareBones Fantasy™ Roleplaying Game

These rules are intended to be used alongside BareBones Fantasy. The main question and answer tools use the basic skill roll, with automatic yes-no, and critical yes-no behaving exactly as a skill/attribute check is made. This means that most questions can be asked and answered without needing to refer to these rules at all.

The open question tools, used for questions like "what are they thinking?" or "what is in the box?" use a pair of word grids, similar to Word Mill's Mythic, but these lists have been customized to reflect BareBones Fantasy. The two word grids live on just one page; that is the only page you would need to print off if you wanted to play away from a computer.

The bulk of this book is made up of examples, tips and advice to help you get into solo playing the game with a minimum of snags and false starts.

Print + PDF bundles of this title are available from my own store. https://ppmgames.myshopify.com/products/light-fantasy-solo
